summary: A group of party goers have trouble getting their boat ashore on a small island. The inhabitants of the island try to help, often with the help of an old sailor, and the results are absurd and hilarious.
cast: Monica Zetterlund|Lars Ekborg|Birgitta Andersson|Gösta Ekman|Katie Rolfsen|Hans Alfredson|Hatte Furuhagen|Tage Danielsson|Jim Hughes
keywords: message in a bottle|sailboat|bumbling|run aground|hit in the head
title: Att angöra en brygga
